MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH45 postcode area of Peebles, affecting properties in Eddleston and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:30pm, this is to complete the final repair and remove generators to return the network to normal and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:46pm on Wednesday, 07 April 2021
